title: Flying menace
creator_credit: W. H. Shepherd, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Describes the life cycle of the fruit fly, and the destruction it causes among Australian fruit. Illustrates the precautions being taken by the Department of Agriculture in checking the spread of the menace and shows how farmers should destroy contaminated fruit.
creator_credit_for_label: W. H. Shepherd, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
description: Describes the life cycle of the fruit fly, and the destruction it causes among Australian fruit. Illustrates the precautions being taken by the Department of Agriculture in checking the spread of the menace and shows how farmers should destroy contaminated fruit.
